casebody.data:
No. 10-6165. Robert Herrera, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 562 U.S. 1266, 131 S. Ct. 1595,

179 L. Ed. 2d 492,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1764. February 28, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1011, 131 S. Ct. 522, 178 L. Ed. 2d 385, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8479.
